message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $140 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle on $130?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still a bit lower than that. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
